primary_concerns: Daemon compilation failure prevents core functionality

all_binaries_build.details: CLI builds successfully, daemon has compilation errors
all_binaries_build.evidence: landro binary exists, landro-daemon compilation fails

file_transfer_works.details: Basic file transfer functionality not implemented
file_transfer_works.evidence: No evidence of working file transfer between instances

no_data_corruption.details: Cannot test without file transfer functionality

critical_tests_pass.evidence: Need to identify and run critical tests

critical_blockers.title: Daemon compilation failure
critical_blockers.description: landro-daemon crate fails to compile due to unresolved import/dependency issues
critical_blockers.impact: Prevents core daemon functionality, blocks all alpha testing
reproduction_steps: Run: env -u CARGO_BUILD_JOBS -u RUSTC_WRAPPER cargo build --release -p landro-daemon
Observe compilation error: could not compile `landro-daemon` (lib) due to 1 previous error
next_actions: Identify and fix missing imports/dependencies in daemon crate
Verify all daemon module dependencies are correctly configured

critical_blockers.title: File transfer functionality not implemented
critical_blockers.description: No working file transfer capability between daemon instances
critical_blockers.impact: Core feature missing for alpha demonstration
reproduction_steps: Examine codebase for file transfer implementations
Look for end-to-end file sync functionality
next_actions: Implement basic file transfer between two daemon instances
Create minimal sync protocol for alpha demonstration

medium_priority_issues.title: Build warnings exceed alpha threshold
medium_priority_issues.description: 76 build warnings vs target of <50 for alpha release
medium_priority_issues.impact: Code quality concerns, potential hidden issues
next_actions: Fix visibility and dead code warnings
Review deprecation warnings in watcher module

positive_findings.details: Successfully resolved CARGO_BUILD_JOBS and RUSTC_WRAPPER configuration issues
landro CLI compiles and is ready for testing
Comprehensive testing and monitoring scripts created and working
Release build completes in ~36 seconds, acceptable for development cycle

mitigation_strategy: Focus on minimal viable alpha functionality
Implement basic file transfer before advanced features

recommendation.rationale: While build infrastructure is working and CLI compiles, the daemon compilation failure is a critical blocker that prevents any functional testing of the core landropic functionality.
